author: Marta Jary For Daily Mail Australia
title: Tziporah Malkah slammed as 'awful' and BANNED by Triple M | Daily Mail Online

organizations.name: triple m | daily mail online share

text: Share 106 shares When asked by co-host Mark Geyer if she'd like to be famous again, Tziporah said, 'Oh ... I don't know, does it mean I have to talk to you people all the time?' Gus then said he didn't wish to have her back on the show, but Mark defended the actress saying that perhaps she was 'playing a role'. But Gus disagreed, and said the reality star seemed to be genuine and he therefore felt she was 'awful'. Not amused: 'Believe us, this will be the first and last time you speak to us,' radio host Gus Worland said, 'I don't think she plays a role. I think that's exactly who she is and she's awful' The team was not amused! During the interview, Tziporah also defended her clash with fellow contestant Kris Smith, saying she called him an 'anti-semite' because he accused her of standing in front of a dart board During the interview, Tziporah also defended her clash with fellow contestant Kris Smith, saying she called him an 'anti-semite' because he accused her of standing in front of a dart board. 'I thought if you're going to throw stupid accusations at me, I'll throw a stupid accusation at you,' she said. Tziporah added, 'Saying I'm standing in front of the dartboard on purpose, that's a terrible claim. You can't claim that about someone. I take my darts seriously'. Fight club: Tziporah also defended her clash with fellow contestant Kris Smith saying she called him an 'anti-semite' because he accused her of standing in front of a dart board Gaming! 'Saying I'm standing in front of the dartboard on purpose, that's a terrible claim. You can't claim that about someone. I take my darts seriously' Tziporah said of her fight with Kris She then became fiery when Matty said she 'loved stirring the pot' a claim which appeared to anger the reclusive star. 'No I don't. How would you know that? Do you know me? What pot? What pot did I stir?' she argued. The interview is the latest in a series of eyebrow raising moments from the former fiance of James Packer. What pot! She then became fiery when Matty said she 'loved stirring the pot'. 'No I don't. How would you know that? Do you know me? What pot? What pot did I stir?' she argued Odd? Last week on I'm a Celeb, the brunette was seen bizarrely eating her dinner from under a bed sheet in an attempt to shield herself from her baffled costars during meal time Last week on I'm a Celeb, the brunette was seen bizarrely eating dinner from under a bed sheet in an attempt to shield herself from her baffled costars during meal time. Defending her table manners, the TV star bluntly stated: 'I don't looking at toxic people when you eat. It is bad for your digestion.' The 43-year-old wont eat in front of her I'm a Celebrity co-stars: 'I don't looking at toxic people when you eat. It is bad for your digestion!' she said on the show
